content.rendered:
A unique craftsman-style eco lodge with lagoon view

CURRENTLY UNDER CONTRACT

$335,000

register interest

Property Information

Offering comfortable and relaxed tropical living in a haven designed to blend with the natural environment, within footsteps of Turoa Beach!

Beautifully constructed using all locally sourced materials, this remarkable craftsman style lodge is set on a secluded section of 874sqm, with a commercial lease running until 2060.  

Tucked away off the main road in the Turoa Beach area of Totokoitu, Takitumu District, Totokoitu Lodge is within steps from the lagoon approx 50 metres away.  Within a short 2-minute drive from Wigmores Grocery Store, Cafe Latte, and Vaima Restaurant in the vicinity, and approximately 20 minutes drive from town. 

Built by hand using natural iron wood, coconut timber, local mahogany, and local ou timber, the interior features an open-plan design with built-in spaces for comfortable & relaxed tropical living.  A partition wall creates a double bedroom at one end of the home, and an upstairs loft area with WC creates a generous master bedroom suite at the other end.  Inside the main entrance is a beautiful modern tiled bathroom with walk-in shower accented with natural coral walls, a separate WC, and spiral staircase with handcrafted wooden railing. 

Blending architectural lines and natural materials with the lush environment, this eco home features endless detail and character inside and outside. Design includes natural ironwood support columns, exposed frame woodwork, insect screened clerestory windows, plexiglass hand-crafted doors, built-in cupboards & cabinetry, and polished hardwood flooring.

Extensive covered verandahs wrap around 3 sides of the lodge and offer inviting outdoor living space to relax and enjoy your own private hideaway of lush tropical surroundings. 

Adding to the charm of this unique property is its stunning turquoise-blue lagoon view enjoyed from the living area and front verandah, and direct beach access. 

An attractive lifestyle investment currently rented on the long-term market. Must be viewed to be fully appreciated! 

  • Commercial leasehold ownership until 2060
  • Beachside location on the protected Southern side of Rarotonga
  • Secluded section of 874sqm with view of the lagoon and direct beach access
  • Open plan design, constructed from locally sourced natural timbers
  • 2-double bedrooms including loft master suite with toilet, modern bathroom and second toilet downstairs
  • Extensive wrap-around covered verandahs
  • Front and rear garden areas of lush exotic flora and fauna
Register interest

Register your interest

Get in touch at Jeff Tikitau Real Estate for further details!

  • enquire@jefftikitaurealestate.com
  • +682 53659
  • Main Road, Avarua Rarotonga, Cook Islands
